name: Eztotp
body:
# EzTotp: Two-factor authentication for eZPublish

**This software is in development and not stable nor fully functional yet! You use this at your own risk.**

## Description
This is an eZPublish extension which implements a two-factor authentication for the eZPublish login process.

The second authentication-factor is done with the Google Authenticatior mobile app:
http://support.google.com/accounts/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=1066447

For more information refere to the SETUP and LICENSE file.


## Community
You can find this extension on github.com
Bugreporting and Pullrequest are welcome!
https://github.com/frne/eztotp

When the time has come, and the first major-release is out, there will be a project on ez.no and a project webpage...

## Support
I will not provide any user- oder installation-support. If you find a bug, please report or fix and pull-request it. Please use the github issue-tracker for communication. I will ignore e-mails.


## Misc

@version 0.2
